news.title: Delta Now Has DS Support
news.caption: Available this Saturday for patrons, NOW for everyone else.

news.title: Delta Now Available
news.caption: Finally, relive your favorite NES, SNES, GB(C), GBA, and N64 games.

apps.name: AltStore BETA
apps.subtitle: An alternative App Store for iOS.
apps.versionDescription:
** Requires latest AltServer beta to fully work. Download from https://altstore.io/altserver/beta **

The next big beta feature is here: AltStore now supports 3rd party app sources! Add sources in the Browse tab to expand the number of apps available to download through AltStore.

NEW FEATURES
• Initial support for 3rd party sources
• Activate and deactivate apps via drag & drop
• Option to remove app extensions from apps to save active app slots

BUG FIXES
• Fixes issue causing .ipa files to appear disabled in document picker
• Fixes issue causing refreshing to sometimes not finish when using older AltServer
• Fixes "invalid app group" error when installing apps
• Removes cached apps after they have been uninstalled
• Fixes peek & pop on iOS 12

PREVIOUS BETA
• Adds support for activating/deactivating apps to stay under iOS 13.3.1 active app limit
• Significantly improves performance when refreshing apps
• Improves error messages when refreshing apps
• Improves stability when refreshing apps over WiFi

NOTE: Support for 3rd party sources will be disabled in public versions of AltStore until it is finished.
apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This beta release of AltStore allows you to install Delta as well as any app (.ipa) directly from the Files app.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

apps.name: Delta BETA
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription:
GENERAL
• Replaces 3D Touch peek/pop with iOS 13 context menus

CONTROLLER SKINS
• Brand new Nintendo DS controller skin
• New Quick Save, Quick Load, and Fast Forward inputs for controller skins
• Apply video filters with controller skins
• Assign controller skins to individual games
apps.localizedDescription:
The next console for Delta is coming: this beta version of Delta brings support for playing DS games!

DS support currently includes:
• Playing DS games
• Save States
• Hold Button

Features I'm still working on:
• Fast Forward
• Cheats
• Controller skin (using placeholder controller skin for now)

Please report any issues you find to support@altstore.io. Thanks!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

apps.name: Clip
apps.subtitle: Manage your clipboard history with ease.
apps.versionDescription:
• Disables notification vibration when sound is disabled for notifications.

Assuming all goes well, this should be the final beta before the public launch! Please report any last minute bugs you find to support@altstore.io.
apps.localizedDescription:
Clip is a simple clipboard manager for iOS. 

Unlike other clipboard managers, Clip can continue monitoring your clipboard while in the background. No longer do you need to remember to manually open or share to an app to save your clipboard; just copy and paste as you would normally do, and Clip will have your back.

In addition to background monitoring, Clip also has these features:

• Save text, URLs, and images copied to the clipboard.
• Copy, delete, or share any clippings saved to Clip.
• Customizable history limit.

Download Clip today, and never worry about losing your clipboard again!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Clip to continuously monitor your clipboard in the background.
